scripts.test:with-server: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; LOG=/tmp/runs.test.log; PID=/tmp/runs.pid; setsid pnpm dev >"$LOG" 2>&1 & echo $! > "$PID"; trap "kill -- -$(cat $PID) 2>/dev/null || true" EXIT; for i in {1..45}; do curl -sf "http://localhost:${RUNS_PORT:-4101}/health" >/dev/null && break; sleep 1; done; if ! curl -sf "http://localhost:${RUNS_PORT:-4101}/health" >/dev/null; then echo "[test] runs never became healthy"; (tail -n 200 "$LOG" || true); exit 1; fi; vitest run || { code=$?; echo "[test] vitest failed, last server logs:"; (tail -n 200 "$LOG" || true); exit $code; }'
